__e: We still think you're too young, and we have many other concerns, but we also trust you and believe in your judgment.
I understand your concern, but I'm asking you to just give us a little more time.
You're nothing but trouble to me, but I still love you.
Of course, you haven't got the worries that I have.
That... I have so many worries... I realized just now that this is the best news of the day.
You have so many worries, and here I am whining.
Don't make your mum's worries your own, boy.
I will not give you more 'concerns For those who have already ' But I'm afraid I will have to 'do it.
It looks like they also had their moral preoccupations.
Leave your cares with me and take your happy news to your husband.
Look, you don't have to convince me. I voiced my concerns, and you told me your plans. We had pie.
You're right, until 2 days ago I didn't worry about anything... and now I feel 10 years older.
And I was talking to your friend over there About your health concerns,
I told him to leave his concerns at the bank. But he would worry about his work.
Jack... my concerns for Stan have nothing to do with us.
My concern is only for my wife.
Well, not only do I not have concerns, I'm glad you've handed it off.
My preoccupations are my work, and my wife, my daughter...
